channel.title: ChatMa
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: Version 3.6.0 (Build 85)
item.description:
• New Feature: Add Support for DeepSeek and xAI
  • New Feature: Support for file chat (PDF and images), files can be dragged directly onto the Dock app icon or menu bar icon
  • New Feature: Added file translation feature (currently only supports SRT subtitle translation and requires manual proofreading)
  • New Feature: After selecting text, press "option" + "command" + left mouse down to quickly translate the text
  • New Feature: In the text editing box, quickly pressing "space" + "option" 3 times can call up the shortcut menu
  • Optimization: Supported some new models and removed some deprecated models
  • Optimization: Allows quick modification of AI provider, model, and prompt in the title bar
